Name: Lovely Anna
About the game: Lovely anna - In this mahjong connect game you will learn about an unusual girl who offers a tour of her country estate to everyone for a rather unusual fee. To dispel all doubts and rumors, you decide to go and see everything with your own eyes. Follow the owner of the estate as you help her solve the puzzle over and over again and get ready to see something unusual ... Peculiarities: - Nice graphics from Milksoft Games - Nice soundtrack
